1817772953: Uburiganya ntabwo ari uburyo bushya bw'icyaha. Mubyukuri, abahanga mu bucukumbuzi bw'ibyataburuwe mu matongo bavumbuye ibikoresho byo kurwanya uburiganya byateguwe n'Abasumeriya ba kera mu gutwara amatungo nta gihombo hashize imyaka 10,000! Ndetse no muri icyo gihe, abafite ubucuruzi bari bafite impungenge ko abantu bose bahuraga nabo bari hejuru. Hahindutse byinshi mumyaka 10,000, ariko gukenera guhanga udushya mukurinda uburiganya biracyari kumwe natwe. Uyu munsi, ikibazo cyuburiganya bwo kuri interineti ningirakamaro cyane. Turasaba kandi Integrated kugirango dukoreshe serivisi ya hCaptcha kugirango tugabanye uburiganya, ihohoterwa, na spam kurubuga rwabo, porogaramu zigendanwa, nibindi bintu byo kumurongo. 3963216198: Kugirango tuganire ku mpamvu APIs ari intego ikunzwe kuri ba hackers, birakwiye ko ubanza gufata akanya gato kugirango usobanure icyo ijambo "API" risobanura. 1047251718: Uyu munsi, ariko, iyo abantu bavuga kuri API, bahora basobanura ibipimo bishingiye kuri API. Izi ni API zubatswe ukoresheje ibipimo bifunguye nka Guhagararira Leta Kwimura (REST) no gufungura imiterere isanzwe ya dosiye nka JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Bene "RESTful APIs", nkuko bizwi, irashobora gushirwaho bidakenewe software yihariye. Ibisubizo APIs birashobora kohereza no kwakira amakuru hamwe nuburyo bwo guhamagara hagati ya porogaramu. Kurugero, porogaramu ya banki igendanwa ikoresha API kugirango igere kuri sisitemu ya banki.
1903743785: Kuza kw'ibipimo bishingiye kuri API byagereranyaga intambwe ikomeye muguhuza porogaramu. Mu myaka 20 ishize cyangwa irenga, APIs zagiye zihenze kandi zigoye ibicuruzwa bya software bya nyirarureshwa kubuntu, ibikoresho-bishingiye kubikoresho byari byoroshye gukorana-kandi byihuse kubikora.
879362350: Hamwe na API nshya zikorera kuri enterineti, byashobokaga guhuza software iyo ari yo yose cyangwa isoko yamakuru, aho ariho hose kwisi, tutitaye kumurongo, imibare yamakuru cyangwa ururimi. Nkigisubizo, isi yo kubara ubu iri hagati ya revolution ya API. Habayeho guturika guhuza hagati ya porogaramu na data. Nibyiza, kugeza igihe bitaribyo.
3844432472: Gufungura cyane hamwe nibikorwa bya APIs bituma bagira intego zidasanzwe kubatera. Nuburyo bumwe porogaramu igendanwa ishobora gutegurwa kugirango igere no KUBONA amakuru kuva muri sisitemu yumuryango ukoresheje API, bityo rero igice cya malware. Hackers banditse ibikoresho byinshi bya software kugirango bakoreshe API. Nubuhanga bukomeye bwo gutera.
2187096543: Mubyukuri, haribintu bimwe byingenzi byacitse biturutse kuri software yanditswe na hacker yahamagaye API gukuramo amakuru mububiko. Nyuma ya byose, niba yibye amakuru bisaba gusa KUBONA guhamagarwa kuri API, byanditswe ukoresheje REST na JSON, noneho biroroshye kwambura data base isuku. Mubyukuri, iyo abantu bavuga kubitero bya "ecran scraping", icyo bashaka kuvuga, cyane cyane, ni guhamagarwa-byihuse API guhamagara amakuru mububiko. API zahindutse igitero kinini kumashyirahamwe abubaka.

Amategeko akurikizwa arashobora kudusaba cyangwa kutwemerera kwanga icyifuzo cyawe. Niba twanze icyifuzo cyawe, tuzakubwira impamvu, ukurikije amategeko abuza. Niba ushaka gutanga ikirego kijyanye no gukoresha amakuru yawe bwite cyangwa igisubizo kubyo wasabye bijyanye namakuru yawe bwite, urashobora kutwandikira kuri
433026247: Mugukora imirimo, urashobora kubona impamyabumenyi nubuhanga, ibyo tuzabitanga mubushake bwacu. Dufite uburenganzira bwo gukora, guhindura, cyangwa gukuraho impamyabumenyi yawe nubuhanga igihe icyo aricyo cyose, kubwimpamvu cyangwa ntampamvu namba. Kuberako tutavangura dushingiye ku nkomoko y'igihugu, ubwoko, ibara, igitsina, icyerekezo cy'imibonano mpuzabitsina, cyangwa ikindi cyiciro icyo ari cyo cyose kirinzwe n'amategeko, uzagira amahirwe nkayabandi bose batanga umusanzu kugirango bagere kubikorwa nkuko ubumenyi bwawe n'ubuhanga bwawe birundanya. . Nkumuterankunga, niba wemera ko ibibazo byikibazo byagize ingaruka kubushobozi bwawe, ubuhanga, cyangwa ibihembo, urashobora gutanga ibitekerezo bishyigikiwe neza bisobanura ibibazo byikizamini ukoresheje ikibazo cyakazi cyangwa ukoresheje itike muri sisitemu yo kugoboka, urugero ukoresheje imeri kuri
799274928: Amatangazo ya imeri afatwa nk'imenyesha ryanditse kubwimpamvu zose zishobora gukenerwa. Amatangazo ya e-imeri afatwa nk'ayakiriye umunsi w'akazi nyuma yo kohereza neza uwagenewe.
